Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: 1. Understand the Goal: The objective is to create two POWL models based on a provided textual description of a hiring process at GlobalTeq Solutions. Model 1: Represents the process with potential unfairness. Model 2: Represents the process without unfairness. Constraint: Use the provided Python-like syntax structure for POWL models

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 2. Analyze the Process Description: Step 1: Application and Data Check. Activity: ReceiveApplication. Activity: DataCompletenessCheck. Loop: If data is missing, RequestMoreInfo back to Check. Step 2: Skill Assessment. Step 3: Cultural Fit divergence. Unfair Model: XOR choice. Fair Model: Single path. Step 4: Final Decision

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: 3. Drafting Model 1 With Unfairness: Structure: Sequence of steps. Start: ReceiveApplication. Loop: DataCompletenessCheck and RequestMoreInfo. POWL Loop Syntax: OperatorPOWL operator LOOP children DataCompletenessCheck RequestMoreInfo. Sequence: Application Loop Skill Assessment. Bias XOR: After SkillAssessment XOR CulturalFitCheck CommunityAffiliationCheck. End: Merge to ManagerialReview FinalDecision

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Refining the Loop: The description says If the resume is complete process continues. Any missing information triggers a loop ask to provide additional details before proceeding. In POWL A DataCompletenessCheck B RequestMoreInfo

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: 4. Drafting Model 2 Without Unfairness: Structure: Similar sequence remove XOR bias. Start: ReceiveApplication. Loop: Same. Sequence: Application Loop Skill Assessment. Cultural Fit: Just CulturalFitCheck. End: ManagerialReview FinalDecision

Name: Validation - PE
Text: 5. Coding the POWL Models Mental Check of Syntax: Import necessary classes. Define Transitions. Define Operators Loop XOR. Define StrictPartialOrder PO. Add edges to PO. Correction on POWL Syntax based on prompt example

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Self-Correction on Loop Logic: The prompt example for loop is execute A then either exit or execute B and then A again. So A DataCompletenessCheck B RequestMoreInfo. This fits the description

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Self-Correction on XOR Logic: Model 1 X CulturalFitCheck CommunityAffiliationCheck. Model 2 No XOR Just CulturalFitCheck

Name: Validation - PE
Text: 7. Final Review: Does Model 1 show the bias Yes via the XOR including CommunityAffiliationCheck. Does Model 2 remove the bias Yes linear flow with only CulturalFitCheck. Are the imports correct Yes. Are the activity labels consistent Yes
